mapper.sql: PK_BS_GROUP_PROV, PK_BS_GROUP, PK_BS_PROV, MATCH_TYPE, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from am_bs_group_prov
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into am_bs_group_prov
PK_BS_GROUP_PROV,
PK_BS_GROUP,
PK_BS_PROV,
MATCH_TYPE,
PK_CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
#{pkBsGroupProv,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{pkBsGroup,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{matchType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.update:
update am_bs_group_prov
PK_BS_GROUP_PROV = #{record.pkBsGroupProv,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_BS_GROUP = #{record.pkBsGroup,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_BS_PROV = #{record.pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR},
MATCH_TYPE = #{record.matchType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update am_bs_group_prov set PK_BS_GROUP_PROV = #{record.pkBsGroupProv,jdbcType=CHAR}, PK_BS_GROUP = #{record.pkBsGroup,jdbcType=CHAR}, PK_BS_PROV = #{record.pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR}, MATCH_TYPE = #{record.matchType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update am_bs_group_prov
PK_BS_GROUP = #{pkBsGroup,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_BS_PROV = #{pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR},
MATCH_TYPE = #{matchType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PK_BS_GROUP_PROV = #{pkBsGroupProv,jdbcType=CHAR}

update am_bs_group_prov set PK_BS_GROUP = #{pkBsGroup,jdbcType=CHAR}, PK_BS_PROV = #{pkBsProv,jdbcType=CHAR}, MATCH_TYPE = #{matchType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_BS_GROUP_PROV = #{pkBsGroupProv,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t4.*,IFNULL(t5.ASSET_COUNT,0) AS ASSET_COUNT FROM ( SELECT a.`PK_BS_PROV`,a.`BS_NAME`, (CASE b.`MATCH_TYPE` WHEN 0 THEN '自动映射' WHEN 1 THEN '人工指定' ELSE '未知' END ) AS MATCH_TYPE ,c.`PROV_NAME` FROM `am_bs_prov` a,`am_bs_group_prov` b ,`bdm_prov` c WHERE a.`PK_BS_PROV` = b.`PK_BS_PROV` AND b.`PK_BS_GROUP` = #{groupId} AND c.`PROV_CODE` = a.`PROV_CODE` ) t4 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.`PK_BS_PROV`,COUNT(1) AS ASSET_COUNT FROM (SELECT a.`PK_BS_PROV`,a.`BS_NAME`, (CASE b.`MATCH_TYPE` WHEN 0 THEN '自动映射' WHEN 1 THEN '人工指定' ELSE '未知' END ) AS MATCH_TYPE ,c.`PROV_NAME` FROM `am_bs_prov` a,`am_bs_group_prov` b ,`bdm_prov` c WHERE a.`PK_BS_PROV` = b.`PK_BS_PROV` AND b.`PK_BS_GROUP` = #{groupId} AND c.`PROV_CODE` = a.`PROV_CODE`) t RIGHT JOIN `am_asset` m ON t.`PK_BS_PROV` = m.`PK_PROV_BS` GROUP BY t.`PK_BS_PROV` HAVING t.`PK_BS_PROV` IS NOT NULL ) t5 ON t4.`PK_BS_PROV`=t5.`PK_BS_PROV`
